raw_text: For predicate argument structure analysis, we have the following representative large corpora: FrameNet (Fillmore et al,2001), PropBank (Palmer et al, 2005), and NomBank (Meyers et al, 2004) in English, the Chinese PropBank (Xue, 2008) in Chinese, the GDA Corpus (Hashida, 2005), Kyoto Text Corpus Ver.4.0 (Kawahara et al, 2002), and the NAIST Text Corpus (Iida et al, 2007) in Japanese.The construction of such large corpora is strenuous and time-consuming
clean_text: For predicate argument structure analysis, we have the following representative large corpora: FrameNet (Fillmore et al,2001), PropBank (Palmer et al, 2005), and NomBank (Meyers et al, 2004) in English, the Chinese PropBank (Xue, 2008) in Chinese, the GDA Corpus (Hashida, 2005), Kyoto Text Corpus Ver.4.0 (Kawahara et al, 2002), and the NAIST Text Corpus (Iida et al, 2007) in Japanese.
